td.content: shows nodular aggregates of basalioma cells are present in the dermis and exhibit peripheral palisading and retraction, melanin is also present within the tumor and in the surrounding stroma

td.content: s:a white male embalmer aged 29 years presents with moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip x 5 weeks. pt also complains of moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds, moderate ulcer on left elbow. o:Height 75 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream, and ordered Shave biopsy.

content2.Unmatched: irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds ,

td.content: s:patient presents with mild flatulence and mild diarrhea. These symptoms are present for about 11 days. patient is a 29 yr old white male embalmer. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 75 in, Weight 155 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered Urea breath test.
